hero.title: Our Products
hero.subtitle: Innovative solutions built for the Indian market
hero.description: Discover our portfolio of products designed to solve real-world problems and empower businesses across India.

products.name: Geet Bal Sanskar
products.description: Digital platform preserving and teaching Indian cultural values and traditions to children through interactive content and activities.

products.name: Finsova
products.description: Comprehensive fintech solution offering credit management, digital payments, and financial services similar to CRED but tailored for Indian users.

products.name: Radhika Machine Tools
products.description: Digital platform for machine tools manufacturing company showcasing products, services, and enabling online business operations.

products.name: JBI Business Platform
products.description: Comprehensive business management platform for small and medium enterprises with integrated CRM, inventory, and analytics.

products.name: SRI Enterprise Solution
products.description: Enterprise-grade solution for large organizations focusing on workflow automation, resource management, and performance analytics.

products.name: TechMailer Pro
products.description: Advanced bulk email marketing platform with automation, analytics, and deliverability optimization for businesses of all sizes.

products.name: TechSMS Gateway
products.description: Reliable bulk SMS service with API integration, delivery tracking, and multi-operator support for marketing and transactional messages.

products.name: TechDesk Support
products.description: Complete IT helpdesk and ticketing system with asset management, knowledge base, and automated workflows for enterprises.

products.name: TechVault Backup
products.description: Automated cloud backup solution with encryption, versioning, and disaster recovery for critical business data protection.
